creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg for the Weisberg Collection of European Drawings and Prints of the Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Centuries
description: many soldiers, some wearing light-colored cloaks or smocks, carrying guns; soldier on horseback left of center; picket fence with open gate at right; five light poles
signed: LRC, in the print: [A. Lancon]; LLC, in the print: [Porte d\'Orleans Novembre 1870]
title: Porte d'Orleans
